parameters.name: Group ID
parameters.description: Group id from table creature_text. Random text will be said if multiple rows with the same group

parameters.name: Delay
parameters.description: Duration to wait before TEXT_OVER event is triggered

name: SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL
description: {source}: {pram1value:choose(0):{pram2value:choose(0):Demorph|Morph to model {pram2}}|Morph to model from creature {pram1}}

name: SMART_ACTION_SOUND

parameters.name: Only to self
parameters.description: True - only target will hear the sound, false - everyone in visibility range will hear the sound

description: {source}: Play {pram3value:choose(0):direct|distance} sound {pram1} to {pram2value:choose(0):every player in visibility range of {source}|{source}}

parameters.name: Quest ID
parameters.description: Quest ID to mark as failed. Only for players

parameters.name: DirectAdd
parameters.description: True - quest is added to questlog instantly, false - Quest Window pops up

parameters.name: Emote 1
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 2
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 3
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 4
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 5
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

parameters.name: Emote 6
parameters.description: If 0, the emote will be skipped

name: SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_CREATURE
description: {source}: Summon creature {pram1} at {targetid:choose(8):{targetcoords}|{target}'s position, moved by offset {targetcoords}} as summon type {pram2}{pram2value:choose(8):| with duration {pram3} seconds}{pram4value:choose(0):| and attack action invoker}

name: SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_CREATURE_TC_MASTER
description: {pram5value:choose(0|1|2|3):{source}|{source}|[s]Action invoker[/s]|[s]Action invoker[/s]|{source}}: Summon creature {pram1} at {targetid:choose(8):{targetcoords}|{target}'s position, moved by offset {targetcoords}} as summon type {pram2}{pram2value:choose(8):| with duration {pram3} seconds}{pram5value:choose(0|1|2|3):|, as personal spawn||, as personal spawn|}{pram4value:choose(0):| and attack action invoker}

name: SMART_ACTION_THREAT_ALL_PCT

parameters.name: Increment
parameters.description: Modify threat of all units in threat list by %

parameters.name: Decrement
parameters.description: Modify threat of all units in threat list by %

description: {source}: {pram1value:choose(0):Decrement|Increment} threat of all units in threat list by {pram1value:choose(0):{pram2}|{pram1}}

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_AREAEXPLOREDOREVENTHAPPENS

parameters.name: Quest ID
parameters.description: Trigger quest group event. Also complete the quest

name_readable: Call area explored or event happens

parameters.name: Apply
parameters.description: true - PhaseGroup {pram1} is applied, false - true - PhaseGroup {pram1} is removed

parameters.name: Allow Combat Movement
parameters.description: 0 = stop combat based movement, 1 = enable combat movement

parameters.name: Phase
parameters.description: Note: This is Smart AI event phase, not actual creature phasemask

name: SMART_ACTION_INC_EVENT_PHASE
description: {source}: Increment phase by {pram1} and decrement by {pram2}

parameters.name: With Emote
parameters.description: If set, creature will flee for assist with emote

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_GROUPEVENTHAPPENS
description: {source}: Call group event happened from quest {pram1} on owner

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_GROUPEVENTHAPPENS_AC
description: {source}: Call group event happened from quest {pram1}

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVEAURASFROMSPELL

parameters.name: Spell
parameters.description: Spell id to remove aura, if 0, all auras will be removed

description: {source}: {pram1value:choose(0):Remove all auras|Remove{pram2value:choose(0):| {pram2} charges of} aura due to spell {pram1}}

0.name: Monster kill
0.description: Kill credit from parameter `credit` will be counted up

1.name: Event
1.description: has to be checked what it is

name: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE_RANGE

parameters.name: Phase Min
parameters.description: Minimum phase to random between (SAI phase)

parameters.name: Phase Max
parameters.description: Maximum phase to random between (SAI phase)

description: {source}: Set random event phase between range {pram1} and {pram2}

name: SMART_ACTION_UPDATE_TEMPLATE
description: {source}: Update template{pram2value:choose(0):| and level} as if it was creature {pram1}

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_IN_COMBAT_WITH_ZONE
description: {target}: Set in combat with current zone

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_FOR_HELP
description: {source}: Call for help within {pram1} yards{pram2value:choose(0):| with emote}

name: SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_GO
description: {source}: Summon gameobject {pram1} at {targetid:choose(8):{targetcoords}|my position, moved by offset {targetcoords}} and despawn in {pram2} ms

parameters.name: Quest
parameters.description: Quest to complete when path ends (escort quest)

parameters.name: Despawn time
parameters.description: Despawn time after finishing the path

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: Miliseconds to wait before resuming path

name: SMART_ACTION_WP_STOP

parameters.name: Quest
parameters.description: Quest id to mark as complete or failed

parameters.name: Fail/Complete
parameters.description: Quest will be marked as either completed or failed

description: {source}: Stop path{pram1value:choose(0):, despawn instantly|, despawn in {pram1} ms}{pram2value:choose(0):|{pram3value:choose(0):, complete|, fail} quest {pram2}}

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_FLY_AC
description: {source}: {pram1value:choose(0):Disable|Enable} fly{pram2value:choose(0):| with fly speed {pram2}} and {pram3value:choose(0):enable|disable} gravity

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description: If true, swimming will be enabled

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_ORIENTATION
description: {source}: {targetid:choose(1|8):Set orientation to home position orientation|Set orientation to {target_o}|Look at {target}}

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_ORIENTATION_AC
description: {source}: {pram2value:choose(0):{targetid:choose(1|8):Set orientation to home position orientation|Set orientation to {target_o}|Look at {target}}|Set random orientation}{pram1value:choose(0):| (instant change)}

name: SMART_ACTION_CREATE_TIMED_EVENT

parameters.name: Timed event id
parameters.description: This timed event will be triggered

description: Trigger timed event #{pram1} in {pram2} - {pram3} ms{pram4value:choose(0):| and then trigger every {pram4} - {pram5} ms}{pram6value:choose(0):| with {pram6} chance}

name: SMART_ACTION_MOVE_TO_POS
description: {source}: Move to {targetid:choose(8):position {targetcoords}{pram2value:choose(0):| on transport}|{target} with offset {targetcoords}{pram4value:choose(0):| in {pram4} yd distance}} (point id {pram1}){pram3value:choose(0):| without pathfinding}

parameters.name: Slotmask
parameters.description: If 0 (or 7) all items will be equiped, 1, 2, 4 are bits for next three items (you can add them)

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: Must be greater or equal than 1

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: Must be greater or equal than 1

parameters.name: Group ID
parameters.description: Makes target say its line from creature_text. If player, line from creature_text from this entry will be said. Doesn't trigger TEXT_OVER

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_RANDOM_TIMED_ACTIONLIST
description: {source}: Call random timed action list: {pram1}, {pram2}, {pram3}, {pram4}, {pram5}, {pram6} {pram2value:choose(0|1):(update out of combat)|(update in combat)|(update always)}

name: SMART_ACTION_CALL_RANDOM_RANGE_TIMED_ACTIONLIST
description: {source}: Call random timed action list between range {pram1} and {pram2} {pram2value:choose(0|1):(update out of combat)|(update in combat)|(update always)}

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: If 0, creature will stay idle in place

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1
description: {source}: Remove {pram1} bytes from UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1 with Type {pram2}

name: SMART_ACTION_JUMP_TO_POS
description: {source}: Jump to pos {targetcoords} with speed XY {pram1} and speed Z {pram2}

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_HOME_POS
description: {source}: Set home position to {targetid:choose(1|8):current position|{targetcoords}|position of {target}}

name: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_SOUND
description: {source}: Play random {pram6value:choose(0):direct|distance} sound one of: {pram1}, {pram2}, {pram3}, {pram4} {pram6value:choose(0):of all|only self}

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_CORPSE_DELAY
description: {source}: Sets corpse delay to {pram1} s{pram2value:choose(0):| (multiplied by server corpse decay ratio)}

name: SMART_ACTION_TRIGGER_RANDOM_TIMED_EVENT
description: Triggers Events randomly with Timed EventId between {pram1} and {pram2}

name: SMART_ACTION_SPAWN_SPAWNGROUP
description: {source}: Spawn spawn group with Id: {pram1}{pram2value:choose(0):| in {pram2}-{pram3} ms}{pram4value:choose(0): with flags {pram4}}

name: SMART_ACTION_DESPAWN_SPAWNGROUP
description: {source}: Despawn spawn group with Id: {pram1}{pram2value:choose(0):| in {pram2}-{pram3} ms}{pram4value:choose(0): with flags {pram4}}

name: SMART_ACTION_PLAY_SPELL_VISUAL_KIT
description: {source}: Plays SpellVisual with SpellVisualKitId: {pram1}, KitType: {pram2} for {pram3} ms

name: SMART_ACTION_OVERRIDE_LIGHT
description: Override light {pram2} with light {pram3} in zone {pram1} in {pram4} seconds

name: SMART_ACTION_OVERRIDE_WEATHER
description: Override weather in zone {pram1} to {pram2} with {pram3value} intensity

name: SMART_ACTION_TALK_CONVERSATION
description: Start conversation {pram1}{pram2value:choose(0):| with base object dynamic actor index: {pram2_m1}}

name: SMART_ACTION_MOVE_TO_POS_TARGET_AC
description: {source}: Move to position {targetcoords}{pram1value:choose(0):| with point ID {pram1}}

0.name: active
0.description: show in world as used and not reset (closed door open)

1.name: ready
1.description: show in world as ready (closed door close)

2.name: active alternative
2.description: show in world as used in alt way and not reset (closed door open by cannon fire)

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_CASTER_COMBAT_DIST_AC
description: {source}: {pram2value:choose(0):Set caster combat distance to {pram1} yd|Reset caster combat distance}

name: SMART_ACTION_ADD_IMMUNITY_AC
description: {source}: Apply immunity {pram1} to {pram3}{pram2value:choose(0):| with spell id {pram2}}

name: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_IMMUNITY_AC
description: {source}: Remove immunity {pram1} value {pram3}{pram2value:choose(0):| with spell id {pram2}}

name: SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_FLAG_RESET_AC
description: {source}: {pram1value:choose(0):Disallow SAI phase reset|Allow SAI phase reset}

name: SMART_ACTION_STOP_MOTION_AC
description: {source}: {pram1value:choose(0):{pram2value:choose(0):Do nothing|Expire current movement generator}|{pram2value:choose(0):Stop moving|Stop moving and expire current movement generator}}

name: SMART_ACTION_MUSIC_AC
description: {pram3value:choose(0|1):{source}|[s]All players in zone[/s]|[s]All players in area[/s]}: Play music {pram1}{pram2value:choose(0):| (only to self)}

name: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_MUSIC_AC
description: {pram3value:choose(0|1):{source}|[s]All players in zone[/s]|[s]All players in area[/s]}: Play random music {pram1}, {pram2}, {pram3}, {pram4}{pram2value:choose(0):| (only to self)}

name: SMART_ACTION_CUSTOM_CAST_AC
description: {source}: Cast spell {pram1} with flags {pram2} on {target} with custom values:{pram3value:choose(0):| base points 0: {pram3}}{pram4value:choose(0):|, base points 1: {pram4}}{pram5value:choose(0):|, base points 2: {pram5}}

name: SMART_ACTION_CONE_SUMMON_AC

parameters.name: Distance between each summon in a row

description: {source}: Summon creature {pram1}{pram2value:choose(0):| (for {pram2} seconds)} in cone shape (dist between rings: {pram3}, dist between each summon in row: {pram4}, length of cone: {pram5}, width of cone: {pram6}

name: SMART_ACTION_VORTEX_SUMMON_AC
description: {source}: Summon creature {pram1}{pram2value:choose(0):| (for {pram2} seconds)} in vortex shape (spiral scaling: {pram3}, spiral appearance: {pram4}, range max: {pram5}, phi delta: {pram6})

name: SMART_ACTION_CU_ENCOUNTER_START_AC
description: {source}: Reset cooldowns and removes Heroism debuffs
